Create Workflow Object¶

Use the following template to create a workflow.json object. First test your workflow in webdev, upload your workflow and test files. Since this will be test with tibanna, bigger test files than the ones used in the travis test can be used. You need also to create file formats and software objects in case they do not exists in the system.

Example:

You can find the bedtomultivec workflow.json here

Here is a template’
